products.name: Charlot Bag
products.note: Keep your CHARLES & KEITH products in top condition. Visit our product care page to learn more about how to care for them.
products.description: There is beauty in the understated and our Charlot crossbody is proof of that. Whether it is for work or a dinner date, feel your very best when you have this stylish bag next to you. We are loving the gold-tone details which match seamlessly with the sandy taupe hue, plus the elegantly curved corners finish this charming design on a high note. For an extra confidence booster, pair it with a belted shirt dress and edgy sock boots.
